cards.title: Speedrunner
powers: The next time {Speedrunner} would be dealt damage, reduce it by 1 and draw 1 card.
incapacitatedAbilities: One Player may Play a card now.
One Player may Discard 2 cards. If they do, they may Draw 2 cards.
Reveal the Top card of the Villain Deck, then replace it.

openingLines.default: going for a pb this time, don't forget to subscribe!

cards.title: Arbitrary Code Execution
body: When this card enters play, put one one-shot card from each trash under it.
When this card is destroyed, first play each card from under it, in any order.
powers: Put 1 card from your hand under this card. Destroy this card.

cards.title: Frame-perfect Timing
body: When {Speedrunner} would be dealt damage, you may redirect that damage to the villain target with the lowest HP. If you do so, you may either increase it by 2, draw 1 card, or play 1 card. Then destroy this card.
powers: {Speedrunner} deals 1 target 1 irreducible melee damage. This damage cannot be redirected.

cards.title: Half A Press
body: When you move a card to your trash, place it under this card instead.
When you use a power or draw a card, add 1 token to this card.

When this card is destroyed, {Speedrunner} deals 1 target X projectile damage, and that target deals {Speedrunner} Y radiant damage, where X = the number of cards under this one, and Y = the number of tokens on this card.

cards.title: HOTAS
body: When this card is destroyed, destroy 1 ongoing card and {Speedrunner} deals up to 2 targets 3 fire damage each.
powers: {Speedrunner} deals each non-hero target 1 projectile damage. You may destroy this card.

cards.title: Input Buffer
body: When this card enters play, draw 2 cards.
powers: Discard any number of cards. Deal 1 target 2 energy damage, plus 1 for each card discarded this way.

cards.title: Inventory Overrun
body: Each player reveals cards from the top of their deck until an equipment card is revealed. They put that card in their hand and shuffle the other revealed cards back into their deck.
One player may play a card now.

cards.title: No Clipping
body: Destroy 1 environment card. If you do so, {Speedrunner} regains 2 HP. If not, play the top card of the environment deck, then you may use a power.

cards.title: Original Hardware
body: Reduce damage dealt to {Speedrunner} by 1.
powers: Discard a glitch or strat card. Search your deck for a card with the chosen keyword and either put it in your hand or into play, then shuffle your deck.

cards.title: Out of Bounds
body: When this card enters play, move the top card of the environment deck under it. Then {Speedrunner} deals 1 target 2 psychic damage.
powers: Swap the locations of an environment card in play with a card under this card. Then {Speedrunner} deals 1 target 2 psychic damage.

cards.title: Repeated Backflips
body: Draw a card. Discard a card. Play a card.
Draw a card. Discard a card. Play a card.
One player other than {Speedrunner} may use a power now.

cards.title: Reset Warp
body: Discard your hand. Draw 5 cards. Play 1 card. {Speedrunner} regains 2 HP.

cards.title: RNG Manipulation
body: When a villain card would be played, you may play a card from under this card instead.
At the start of your turn, if there are no cards under this card, one villain target deals themself 2 melee damage, then destroy this card.
powers: Move 1 card from the villain trash or the top card of the villain deck under this card.

cards.title: Sequence Break
body: Whenever a Hero target would be dealt damage by a non-hero card, you may redirect it to {Speedrunner}. If you do, one player may draw a card.
When this card is destroyed, one player may play a card.
At the start of your turn, destroy this card.

cards.title: TAS
body: increase damage dealt by {Speedrunner} by 1.
powers: One player draws 1 card, a second player plays 1 card, and a third player uses 1 power. Damage dealt while this power resolves is irreducible.

cards.title: Turbo Controller
body: If you draw a card outside of your draw phase, you may play a card.
If you play a card outside of your play phase, you may use a power.
If you use a power outside of your power phase, {Speedrunner} deals 1 target 2 fire damage.
powers: {Speedrunner} deals 1 target 1 melee damage X times, where X = the number of your glitch and strat cards in play.
